requirements.summary: Transform all muscle group text to display with capitalized first letters throughout the UI while keeping backend data format unchanged
acceptanceCriteria: All muscle group text displays with the first letter capitalized throughout the application
Capitalization is applied consistently in ExerciseCard component badges
Capitalization is applied in ExerciseLibrary page filter buttons
Capitalization is applied in exercise creation and edit dialogs
Backend data storage format remains unchanged (lowercase)
Transformation is applied at display time only

file_operations.description: Create a utility function to capitalize the first letter of muscle group strings for consistent display transformation across the application
Import and apply the capitalization utility to muscle group text displayed in the badge component
Import and apply the capitalization utility to muscle group filter button labels and muscle group text in the create/edit exercise dialogs
Import and apply the capitalization utility to any muscle group text displayed in the exercise selection list
Import and apply the capitalization utility to any muscle group text displayed in the exercise dropdown selection
